author: Fextralife
description:
Elden Ring Nightreign Review - HIGH OCTANE Combat That Leaves You Wanting MORE
In this Elden Ring Nightreign review, I’ll be sharing my gameplay impressions after spending over 100 hours myself and with 150 hours as a team with the full game, defeating all the bosses, unlocking most events and exploring nearly all of the content the game has to offer. So whether you are a hardcore Elden Ring fan wondering how Nightreign stacks up or a new player curious to know if you can jump in without playing the original Elden Ring, this review is for you!

Elden Ring Nightreign Wiki: https://eldenringnightreign.wiki.fextralife.com/Elden+Ring+Nightreign+Wiki

Timestamp:
0:00 Elden Ring Nightreign Review
0:54 Story and Setting
3:09 Gameplay
11:21 Design, Audio, and Visuals
13:02 Replayability and Multiplayer
14:59 Pricepoint
15:29 Final Thoughts and Game Score

Don't forget to like the video and subscribe to our channel for more!

title: Elden Ring Nightreign Review - HIGH OCTANE Combat That Leaves You Wanting MORE

author: Fextralife
description:
Elden Ring Nightreign LAUNCH - With the FEXTRA Community

Come celebrate the launch of Elden Ring Nightreign with us, as we journey into Limveld and take on the Nightlords! We'll be using password FEXTRA (all CAPS) for those who want to play with us, and for those who need help please post and we'll do what we can :)

Be sure to bookmark the Elden Ring Nightreign Wiki as well for any further help you need: https://eldenringnightreign.wiki.fextralife.com/Elden+Ring+Nightreign@UCVYjECtekNLZCsYeqh4cdCw 

And our Discord is here as well: https://discord.com/channels/316038965624963072/1335913688430805033

Don't forget to like the video and subscribe to our channel for more!
